body:
Is it a requirement to not use an extension on files in raw?

The assumption this seems to be making is that any model loaded from assets will have a .pb extension, even if the calling site doesn't request it. For example, if I name my graph "model.bin_proto" for whatever reason it will now try to load "model.bin_proto.pb". I don't think we want to force this.
